review: The Fire TV Stick is an excellent product.  However, the buffering takes a little more time than expected. But that is due to the dual core processor it is equipped with.  This product is great for individuals that don't want to spend the extra money in upgrading to a smart TV or constantly having to use other devices to access apps like Netflix and Hulu.
